name: Legend of Himari
description:
Legend of Himari is now on Windows!
Himari was ambushed! Help her hold out as long as possible, attack enemies, use magic to slay them, maintain Himari’s health level, so she could fight on, and also do not miss!

Chain up your combos to the maximum, so that your hits will become more powerful!Game features:♥ simple and exciting gameplay;

♥ online scoreboard;
♥ unlockable characters;
♥ terrifying bosses;
♥ gameplay that requires attention.Main game about Himari:http://store.steampowered.com/app/375520/Taimumari/
